lead_paragraph: Belgian authorities have detained four suspects during an antiterrorism sweep linked to the recruitment of potential jihadis to go fight in Syria, officials said Friday.
snippet: Belgian authorities have detained four suspects during an antiterrorism sweep linked to the recruitment of potential jihadis to go fight in Syria, officials said Friday.

headline.main: Belgium: 4 Suspects Detained in Antiterrorism Sweep
headline.print_headline: Belgium: 4 Suspects Detained in Antiterrorism Sweep
